name: A Day at Feral Vector (for Ducky)
name_original: A Day at Feral Vector (for Ducky)
description:
David "ducklingsmith" "Ducky" Mowatt is a prolific Bitsy artist and a dear friend to many in the Bitsy community. This Spring he battled with COVID-19 and was admitted to the hospital for several harrowing weeks. The Bitsy community put together this special "get-well card" for him - set at a virtual Feral Vector - to bring him some cheer as he recovers.

Use the arrow keys/WASD to move. Bump into things to interact with them.

Featuring contributions from:

  • Adam
  • Ash
  • Athena
  • Ayo
  • Becky
